attributes.additional_details: At the time of the last  London Olympics an extra Tax was put on London Residents of £20 per month to pay for the London Olympics. This petition is to ask the Treasury that as the rights of the Broadcast were sold world wide, the money paid in by the shareholders (residents) are now returned and the £20 per month still being paid since the closing ceremony be returned  and stopped.

rejection.details: This issue is a matter for the Major's Office.  Sorry not for HM Government
